skills.title: Front End
skills.description: Passionate front-end developer crafting immersive web experiences. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Translating design into seamless, user-centric interfaces.

skills.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: Expert at many different data structures and algorithms.

skills.title: Team Work
skills.description: Embraces teamwork, team player who can also work independent.

portfolio.title: Pokemon Pokedex Website
portfolio.description: Diving into web development, this project used React and CSS to format and organize Pokemon data that was consumed from the open source REST PokeAPI.

portfolio.title: Wordle remake
portfolio.description: This project was a functional remake of the popular game Wordle. With this project, I got experience working collaboratively with a team all writing code in the same repo and sharpened my Git skills, while also learning more about how to delegate programming tasks between teammates. The app was built with Java and uses JavaFx for the UI.
